thread.title: CBS Poll: Most Democrats Think Christianity Is as Violent as Islam - Justin Holcomb
thread.title_full: CBS Poll: Most Democrats Think Christianity Is as Violent as Islam - Justin Holcomb

author: Justin Holcomb
title: CBS Poll: Most Democrats Think Christianity Is as Violent as Islam - Justin Holcomb
text:
Share Tweet 
Only one-in-seven registered Democrats in America believe the Islam is more violent as a whole than Christianity, according to a new CBS poll . 
Catastrophes such as September 11th, the War on Terrorism, and recent attacks throughout the world were not enough to make a difference between Christianity and Islam for some. 
Republicans had a much different perspective on the matter however. Over six-in-ten believe that Islam is more violent in nature than other religions.
